colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES PA RTA GA-YANG 'GUGS BSAM PA LHUN GRUB RTA GA-YANG @006B 'DI NI SNGON 'DOL BA'I YUL DU RTA GA-YANG SHIN TU RGYUD NAS BKRA MI SHIS PA'I GOD KHA MANG BYUNG BA'I RTA ZAD LA SEMS CAN GYI DON DU BTZUN PA SU TI KARMA MING CAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^SLOB DPON PADMA DKAR GYIS GA-YANG 'GUGS CHEN PO MU TIG PHRENG BA SOGS GZHI LA BLTAS TE 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA'O, DGE BA'I 'GRO KUN BDE SKYED LDAN PAR SHOG ,)
